verses.verse: Thus all the work <WH4399> that Solomon <WH8010> made <WH6213> for the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> was finished <WH7999>: and Solomon <WH8010> brought <WH935> in all the things <WH6944> that David <WH1732> his father <WH1> had dedicated <WH6944>; and the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and all the instruments <WH3627>, put <WH5414> he among the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.

Then Solomon <WH8010> assembled <WH6950> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>, and all the heads <WH7218> of the tribes <WH4294>, the chief <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, unto Jerusalem <WH3389>, to bring up <WH5927> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> out of the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>, which is Zion <WH6726>.
Why all the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> assembled <WH6950> themselves unto the king <WH4428> in the feast <WH2282> which was in the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>.
And all the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935>; and the Levites <WH3881> took up <WH5375> the ark <WH727>.

And they brought up <WH5927> the ark <WH727>, and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and all the holy <WH6944> vessels <WH3627> that were in the tabernacle <WH168>, these did the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> bring up <WH5927>.

Also king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010>, and all the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478> that were assembled <WH3259> unto him before <WH6440> the ark <WH727>, sacrificed <WH2076> sheep <WH6629> and oxen <WH1241>, which could not be told <WH5608> nor numbered <WH4487> for multitude <WH7230>.

And the priests <WH3548> brought in <WH935> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> unto his place <WH4725>, to the oracle <WH1687> of the house <WH1004>, into the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place <WH3671>, even under the wings of the cherubims <WH3742>:

For the cherubims <WH3742> spread forth <WH6566> their wings <WH3671> over the place <WH4725> of the ark <WH727>, and the cherubims <WH3742> covered <WH3680> the ark <WH727> and the poles <WH905> there above <WH4605>.

And they drew out <WH748> the poles <WH905> of the ark <WH7218>, that the ends of the poles <WH905> were seen <WH7200> from the ark <WH727> before <WH6440> the oracle <WH1687>; but they were not seen <WH7200> outside <WH2351>. And there it is unto this day <WH3117>.

There was nothing in the ark <WH727> except the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> which Moses <WH4872> put <WH5414> in it at Horeb <WH2722>, when the Lord <WH3068> made <WH3772> a covenant with the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, when they came out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it came to pass <WH3548>, when the priests were come out <WH3318> of the holy <WH6944> place <WH3548>: (for all the priests that were present <WH4672> were sanctified <WH6942>, and did not then wait <WH8104> by course <WH4256>:

Also the Levites <WH3881> which were the singers <WH7891>, all of them of Asaph <WH623>, of Heman <WH1968>, of Jeduthun <WH3038>, with their sons <WH1121> and their brothers <WH251>, being arrayed <WH3847> in white linen <WH948>, having cymbals <WH4700> and psalteries <WH5035> and harps <WH3658>, stood <WH5975> at the east end <WH4217> of the altar <WH4196>, and with them a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> priests <WH3548> sounding <WH2690> with trumpets <WH2689>:)

It came even to pass <WH2690>, as the trumpeters and singers <WH7891> were as one <WH259>, to make one <WH259> sound <WH6963> to be heard <WH8085> in praising <WH1984> and thanking <WH3034> the Lord <WH3068>; and when they lifted up <WH7311> their voice <WH6963> with the trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> and instruments <WH3627> of music <WH7892>, and praised <WH1984> the Lord <WH3068>, saying <WH2896>, For he is good; for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>: that then the house <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> with a cloud <WH6051>, even the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>;

So that the priests <WH3548> could <WH3201> not stand <WH5975> to minister <WH8334> by reason <WH6440> of the cloud <WH6051>: for the glory <WH3519> of the Lord <WH3068> had filled <WH4390> the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.
